section.heading: Task Force on Hospital-Based Violence Intervention Programs.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-341: § 301 of D.C. Law 24-341 provided that the creation of this section by § 110(d) of D.C. Law 24-341 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
